definition-item.definition-title: POWER SUPPLY LINES, AND DEVICES ALONG RAILS, FOR ELECTRICALLY- PROPELLED VEHICLES (control of points and safety arrangements along railway lines B61L; construction of rails and points in general E01B)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Overhead, overground or underground power supply lines; their crossings and points, erection and supervision.
Devices along rails and rail joints, for current conduction and for insulation;
Safety devices along the route against earth currents and inductive interference with nearby communication lines
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Control of points and safety arrangements along railway lines

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Construction of rails and points in general

definition-item.definition-title: Power supply lines for contact with collector on vehicle (collectors therefor B60L5/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Collectors therefor

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements along the power lines for reducing interference in nearby communication lines (in general H04B15/02)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Reducing interference in general

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Suspension insulators for overhead transmission lines
Apparatus or processes especially adapted for manufacturing insulators

definition-item.definition-title: incorporating yielding means or damping means (supporting wires B60M1/22)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Damping means in supporting wires

definition-item.definition-title: Manufacturing or repairing trolley lines (scaffold cars B60P; B61D15/00; platforms therefor B66F11/04; manufacturing conductors in general H01B13/00; overhead lines in general H02G1/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines and methods for installing, maintaining, repairing and monitoring overhead electrical power supply lines
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Scaffold cars in general
Scaffold cars for railways
Working platforms
Conductors or conductive bodies characterised by their material
Conductors characterised by their form, e.g. power transmission lines
Apparatus or processes for adapting conductors
Installing, maintaining or repairing of overhead power transmission lines in general

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Power rails in slotted conduits
Crossings; Points for power rails in slotted conduits

definition-item.definition-title: Feeding power to supply lines in contact with collector on vehicles; Arrangements for consuming regenerative power (controlling rail vehicles by varying voltage of power fed to vehicle B60L; power distribution in general H02J)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Controlling rail vehicles by varying voltage of power fed to vehicle

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Power distribution in general

definition-item.definition-title: with means for maintaining voltage within a predetermined range (in general G05F)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Maintaining voltage in general

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements for cutting in and out of individual track sections (by passage of the vehicle B60M1/10)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cutting in and out of individual sections by passage of the vehicle

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements along running rails or at joints thereof for current conduction or insulation, e.g. safety devices for reducing earth currents (insulating rail joints E01B11/54; conductive connections between rails in general H01R3/00, H01R4/00, H01R4/70)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Insulating rail joints

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Conductive connections between rails in general

definition-item.definition-title: {for vehicles using stored power (e.g. charging stations)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Power supply for charging stations
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Charging stations per se where vehicle is not moving
